Instruction: Pat haddock fillets dry with paper towels.
Combine panko breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, zested lemon peel, and garlic powder in a shallow dish.
In a small bowl, mix together melted butter, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
Brush haddock fillets with butter mixture.
Coat haddock fillets with panko mixture, pressing to adhere.
Place fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
Serve with a squeeze of fresh lemon juice.
